item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, January 12, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Obvious things C should do (111 points | 71 comments)
2. Phi 4 available on Ollama (39 points | 23 comments)
3. De-smarting the Marshall Uxbridge (239 points | 72 comments)
4. Cannonball: An enhanced OutRun engine (119 points | 5 comments)
5. Darkest and clearest skies at risk from industrial megaproject (50 points | 18 comments)
6. Track your devices via Apple FindMy network in Go/TinyGo (267 points | 81 comments)
7. IP addresses through 2024 (27 points | 4 comments)
8. Show HN: TypeScript/React/Vue Window Layout Manager (Tabs, Floating, Popouts) (233 points | 49 comments)
9. Contemplative LLMs (8 points | discuss)
10. AI in the 80s? How a Simple Animal Guessing Game Pioneered Machine Learning (22 points | 10 comments)
11. Stop Trying to Schedule a Call with Me (219 points | 64 comments)
12. Decentralized Syndication – The Missing Internet Protocol (39 points | 28 comments)
13. Map of California roads for cyclers (1895) (63 points | 27 comments)
14. Pagecord: Publish your writing effortlessly from your inbox (7 points | 1 comment)
15. Be Aware of the Makefile Effect (382 points | 294 comments)
16. The Tsunami of Burnout Few See (376 points | 228 comments)
17. A visual demo of Ruby's lazy enumerator (98 points | 19 comments)
18. Ingrid Daubechies awarded National Medal of Science (130 points | 8 comments)
19. Wends of Texas (61 points | 32 comments)
20. Chatham House Rule is suddenly everywhere in the Bay Area (68 points | 162 comments)
21. Jensen Huang keynote at CES 2025 [video] (118 points | 70 comments)
22. Show HN: 3D Terrain simulation for hiking, skiing etc. (107 points | 38 comments)
23. Adobe Lightroom's AI Remove feature added a Bitcoin to bird in flight photo (158 points | 90 comments)
24. The engineering behind the San Antonio River Walk (145 points | 23 comments)
25. The Chaos (1922) (74 points | 26 comments)
26. Matt Mullenweg deactivates WordPress accounts of contributors planning a fork (308 points | 128 comments)
27. Binary modding a water dispenser to save me from pressing a button (2021) (85 points | 14 comments)
28. Picasso was suspected of stealing the 'Mona Lisa' (65 points | 43 comments)
29. The Heroic Industry of the Brothers Grimm (41 points | 5 comments)
30. /bin/sh: the biggest Unix security loophole (1984) [pdf] (87 points | 45 comments)
